glossary.Hoisting: This is doing when you declare a variable. Then when app is running, the declared variable is hoisted up to the top of file or function
glossary.Literals: This is a specified constant template for define value

ECMAscript-6.arrow-function: The arrow function allow us to write shorter function
ECMAscript-6.let: The "let" keyword allow us to define local variable
ECMAscript-6.const: The "const" keyword allows us to define not changeable value
